title: [Temperature Check] - Idle and Polygon $700k partnership
body:
### Summary
This Temperature Check aims to approve a **$50k commitment in $IDLE tokens** from Idle Ecosystem Fund to partner with Polygon in a $700k agreement.

Idle Leagues and Polygon team would jointly foster the development of native Polygon projects using Idle, with a **$650k $MATIC incentivization program** and a $50k $IDLE allocation.
$MATIC rewards would be shared with any integration partner that implements Idle’s allocation strategies, while $IDLE funds would be used for grants and hackathons.


### Motivation
Idle yield automation and aggregation are becoming a unique value proposition to enable other projects to easily access different yield opportunities with just one integration effort.

Idle would represent a top-notch gateway to deploy funds and maximize returns on Polygon, letting integrators focus on vault development, yield tokenization, fixed-yield products, and other on-top use cases.

Read the motivations [here](https://gov.idle.finance/t/proposal-idle-and-polygon-700k-partnership-to-jointly-scale-defi-yield-aggregation/647). 

### Details
A Dune dashboard, similar to the one for B2B partners, would track referrals and reward distribution over time.

Program outlines:
* Max incentivized TVL: $300m, first-come-first-serve
* APY boosting: +20% relative increment compared to APY provided by Idle strategies in Polygon, up to +1% net APY
* Rules: incentives are issued weekly to partners in proportion to the deployed TVL

The program is designed to last not less than 3 months, with the expected incentivization phase lasting about 4-5 months. The max program duration is 6 months: Idle Governance would give back any unused funds to the Polygon team after that period.

If Idle protocol reaches $300m TVL via partners’ deposits during the program, the Polygon team will commit an additional **$1.35m** in $MATIC to extend the program for 6 months more.

### Voting Options
Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
**FOR**: Approve $50k allocation from Ecosystem fund and partner with Polygon
**AGAINST**: Do nothing

This poll is available for both [$IDLE token holders](https://snapshot.org/#/idlefinance.eth) and [stkIDLE holders](https://snapshot.org/#/staking.idlefinance.eth).
The final $IDLE voting weights will be calculated using the [approved calculator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BnH9boRmBADuyquvDMh0AmQfF97Zj76sIENKtySLU8o/edit?usp=sharing).
